member.name: P:Meryel.UnityCodeAssist.MQTTnet.Extensions.ManagedClient.ConnectingFailedEventArgs.ConnectResult
member.summary: This is null when the connection was failing and the server was not reachable.

member.name: P:Meryel.UnityCodeAssist.MQTTnet.Extensions.ManagedClient.ManagedMqttClientOptions.MaxTopicFiltersInSubscribeUnsubscribePackets
member.summary: Defines the maximum amount of topic filters which will be sent in a SUBSCRIBE/UNSUBSCRIBE packet. Amazon Web Services (AWS) limits this number to 8. The default is int.MaxValue.
